item.title: How to blend 2 pics together?
item.description: Blend two photos together by our ‚Äúadd image‚Äù featureüëç *Little tricks: The effect will be better with high contrast of the portrait photo! *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}‚ñ∂" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;" allowfullscreen title="How to blend 2 pics together?"
